main event: Three different UFO sightings were reported on different dates in different locations, describing diamond-shaped, elliptical, and hovering objects.
interesting points: One sighting described a diamond-shaped object in an upright position, 10 ft wide, 75 ft long, rotating about its axis and climbing to 5,600 ft before veering off to the northwest.
The second sighting reported an elliptical object hovering and moving very slowly from west to east, estimated to be 350-400 feet in elevation.

The witness in the third sighting reported seeing an unusual object in the sky about 5 miles west of Pecos, Texas, describing it as elliptical in shape and hovering and moving very slowly before disappearing from view.
The report indicates that the witness was considered unreliable in the first sighting.
No photographs were included in the report.
